Text:
PS3Hax dev samson, who was responsible for the PS3 messenger has created a simple IRC client for CFW PS3 users.
The application has been tested and confirmed working on Rebug CFW,
but other CFWâs should work and you can report via reply(s) below. Works on CFW 3.41/3.55.

Also contains a link to the PS3Hax offical IRC channel
